Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session

Interface SessionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.servlet.ServletContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Context
    public interface SessionContext
extends javax.servlet.ServletContext
    Interface providing session management services from a servlet context.

    This interface is implemented by the servlet context to allow the session package to work with contexts without a direct dependency on the Context class. It provides access to session configuration, listeners, and context identification for cluster routing.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.servlet.ServletContext

      • getSessionTimeout

        int getSessionTimeout()
        Returns the session timeout in seconds.
        Specified by:
        getSessionTimeout in interface javax.servlet.ServletContext
        Returns:
        the session timeout, or -1 if sessions never expire

      • isDistributable

        boolean isDistributable()
        Returns whether sessions in this context are distributable. Distributable contexts have their sessions replicated across the cluster.
        Returns:
        true if sessions are distributable

      • getContextDigest

        byte[] getContextDigest()
        Returns the digest that uniquely identifies this context. Used for routing cluster messages to the correct context.
        Returns:
        the context digest (typically MD5 of context path)

      • getContextClassLoader

        java.lang.ClassLoader getContextClassLoader()
        Returns the class loader for this context. Used for deserializing session attributes that may contain application-specific classes.
        Returns:
        the context class loader

      • getSessionAttributeListeners

        java.util.Collection<javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionAttributeListener> getSessionAttributeListeners()
        Returns the session attribute listeners registered with this context.
        Returns:
        collection of session attribute listeners

        Returns the session lifecycle listeners registered with this context.
        Returns:
        collection of session listeners
